1.content: Lets start by selecting the character whose feet you want to play with.
1.title: The Beginning

11.content:
You've chosen Sora, the cute, 14-year old boy with large, sweaty feet.

Now comes the following question: who will you choose to be at his feet?
11.title: You've Chosen: Sora

113.content:
TIME: Kingdom Hearts I
LOCATION: Destiny Islands

         Sora and Kairi are lying on one of the beaches of Destiny Islands, their home. Not much of interest has happened in the day, so the two are spending an hour relaxing and staring at the clouds. Sora, out of ideas for a conversation, brings something up he only wanted to ask Kairi if they were in a potential relationship. "What do you think about feet?"

         Kairi shrugs her shoulders, wiggling her own toes in her shoes. "I dunno. They're feet," she says, giggling. Sora puts his hand on her shoe just to feel her toes wiggling. When he releases, he moves his own toes around. "Well, let's say somebody wanted you to touch their feet. Or lick them. You'd do it?" Kairi sits up and says, "Only if I actually like the person." Sora gets a little nervous and cannot look Kairi in her eyes. She notices. "You want me to touch your feet?"

         Sora looks to his side. "It's just that.. I kind of have this thing where I want a girl to like...lick my feet. Or kiss them, or smell them, or tickle them, or rub them, or basically anything but hurt them."

         Kairi's jaw drops. In all her years of knowing Sora, she would have never guessed that that dirty thought was on his mind. Seeing as she has a burning interest in him, she thinks, "I'd have to be an idiot to pass this up. Even if it's kind of gross." She smiles and grabs Sora's hand. "Why don't you take off your shoes and let me get to work," she says in a mocking seductive voice. Sora immediately kicks his shoes off, revealing to Kairi two sweaty feet. "Thanks for doing this, I know it's weird," he admits, wiping his forehead. "What are friends for?" Kairi asks, standing up to move to Sora's feet.

         There are little sand and dirt particles scattered across them. Kairi upon looking at them wipes as much dirt off as she can. "How do your feet get dirty in shoes?" she asks, concerned with how much will be entering her mouth.

         "I walk barefoot at home, so..."

         After dusting off Sora's feet, Kairi gets on her stomach and lies in front of them. She decides to take note of Sora's feet while she can. In addition to their massive size, his soles are mostly smooth; unlike most boys, it seems that Sora takes moderate care of his feet. His toenails are also clipped appropriately, and are not so long as to scratch Kairi's mouth. "This'll be a piece of cake," she thinks, not knowing what she's getting herself into. She feels the need to compliment the boy. "You have really cute feet, Sora."

         Sora blushes, not used to getting comments amount his looks. "Thanks, Kairi. I'd probably say the same about yours if you ever showed them." Kairi considers what she will do first to Sora's beautiful feet.
113.title: Kairi

choices: Kairi licks the dirt from between Sora's toes
1132.content:
Kairi takes a deep breath and makes contact with Sora's sole. Never having licked another person before, let alone a person's foot, she is completely lost after the initial contact. She awkwardly wags her tongue around one spot. "Kairi?" Sora opens, "Do you think you could take longer licks? I think it would feel a lot nicer."

         Kairi smirks at her crush. "My first time doing it and you're already getting picky, huh? Alright then." Kairi opens her mouth larger and takes a nice, warm lick across Sora's sole, even coating his toes in a slight bit of saliva. Sora's toes curl a little at the feeling of Kairi licking them. Sora has his hands on his head as he feels his body slightly shaking in delight, "Mmm...much better!" As Kairi continues to lick his foot, Sora's toes begin to spread and scrunch back and forth. "Jeez, calm yourself, Sora!" Kairi thinks. Getting annoyed at his inability to hold still, Kairi shoves both of Sora's big toes in her mouth. Her sucking is weak, given her inexperience and the fact that she's doing it to toes. "How am I supposed to make toe sucking feel good?" she ponders.

         She then considers how she fantasised about sucking Sora off, and what she would do to make him ejaculate in her mouth. "Worth a shot." Kairi opens her mouth wider and fits all five toes of one foot in her mouth. While making heavy slurping sounds, she does her best to make her head vibrate as well, to add to the sensation. "Oh...mmm..." Sora moans, grasping at his groin for relief while Kairi goes down on him. After thirty seconds of Sora's foot in her mouth, Kairi pulls back and gasps for air. She's met with the face of a Sora who looks like he's having the time of his life.

         While sucking his toes isn't ideal, the pay-off casts a smile across Kairi's face. She isn't done yet however.
1132.title: Kairi licks Sora's feet

choices: Naminé will lick his feet clean
Naminé will let him trample her
114.content:
TIME: Chain of Memories
SETTING: Castle Oblivion

         After putting an end to the life of Marluxia and two other members of Organization XIII, Sora, Donald, Goofy and Jiminy are set to sleep for an entire year's time in order to regain their memories in their purest form before Naminé corrupted them. While the other are already on their way to sleep, Sora stays with Naminé for a bit longer. His feet are tired and his toes feel all slimy in his shoes thanks to the built up sweat from ascending 13 floors with different worlds. If there was any time for him to want attention given to his feet, it is now.

         "Before I go to sleep, there's something that I would really like you to do, Naminé."

         "Yes?"

         Sora sits on the edge of the open capsule and slowly kicks his shoes off. What Naminé sees are two sweaty feet with some residues of gunk and dirt on them. She is baffled, but nevertheless gets closer to Sora. "Do you mind, um, doing some things with my feet?" Sora asks, spreading his toes.

         Naminé looks down at her own toes, then looks back up at Sora. "They stink a little, and they're dirty, but... I have to make up for what I did to him, whether it was out of my control or not." Naminé gets on her knees at Sora's feet. "I don't mind at all, Sora. What exactly did you have in mind, if I may ask?" Sora gives a chuckle as his right foot plants itself on top of Naminé's blonde hair. Sora scrunches his toes as he ponders what Naminé shall do for him. All the while, her hair continues to get more messy. She is not thrilled by this, but accepts it as to not upset Sora. She can see his left foot still dangling about a metre away from her. Naminé has never complimented somebody on appearances prior, and sees this a starting opportunity. "Your...feet are really nice, Sora," she says, forcing a grin. Sora laughs and spreads his toes out on her hair, making even more of a mess. "Thanks," he says, admittedly causing Naminé to blush.

         Sora takes his foot off of Naminé's head and makes his decision.
114.title: Naminé

choices: Smell Sora's right foot to avoid licking temporarily
1141.content:
"Do you think you could lick my feet, Naminé?"

         Naminé's eyes widen. "He must be joking. Look at all that gunk built-up on his soles." She lets out a nervous laughter, looking up at Sora once more. He has a neutral expression. Naminé's laughter comes to an end as she realises what's going on. Taking a gulp, she gives her answer. "Yes, Sora. I'll...lick your feet."

         Sora stretches and puts both of his feet in front of Naminé's face, mere centimetres away. His toes curl as he waits for Naminé to make a move. Naminé can barely handle the odour, how is she to handle the taste? She clenches her fist, sticks her tongue out and in a quick lick goes from heel to toe on Sora's left foot. The bits of gunk can't faze her if she's going at a fast enough speed. Naminé continues this method as she drags her tongue across Sora's foot repeatedly. Sora lightly pokes Naminé's cheek with his right foot's big toe. "Hey, Naminé, could you go a little slower? I think it would feel more relaxing that way." Naminé feels her body tremble as there is still a lot of gunk on both of those feet. That's not even mentioning the saltier taste thanks to the sweat. Naminé nods her head and closes her eyes.

         "I'm sorry, Sora! I'll do better!" she exclaims, taking hold of his ankles. "Don't feel bad," Sora reassures her. He already has stress from knowing his memories were manipulated with, the last thing he needs is Naminé crying in front of him. Naminé sticks her tongue out and from heel to toe slowly treks every centimetre of Sora's large foot. Right under the big toe is a piece of dirt. Naminé's fingers intertwine as she laps it up into her warm mouth and swallows it. All the while, Sora is moaning in pleasure with an erection.

         Naminé has finished with Sora's left sole. It is practically shiny, glossed by her saliva. But the toes remain. And if there was already so much gunk on his soles, there is no telling what is hiding in between all five of those smelly toes.

         What is Naminé's next move?
1141.title: Naminé Accepts! Sora Gets His Feet Licked

12.content:
You were new to Destiny Islands, and so far had pretty much gotten along with most of the people there.

However, it was all about to come crashing down..

You were hanging out with Riku, and he suddenly made the remark while rubbing his foot through his sneaker, that his feet were hurting.

Your reaction was as simple as:

BOING!

You had been after Riku's feet ever since you got to the islands, this could be your chance!

Suddenly you saw a hand waving in front of your face, "Hey man...you in there?"

"Oh uh..yeah, sorry I must've zoned out."

You weren't sure, but you could've sworn you saw a slight smirk on Riku's face.

"Well....I hate to have to walk all the way back, but I guess we should go before it gets dark." With a grunt he pushed off the log you had been sitting on and groaned as his feet hit the ground.

"Hey uh....I could do something about that for ya." You offered trying not to blush.

Riku looks at you curiously, there was that slight smirk again. "What? You mean....my feet hurting?"

You nodded and cracked your knuckles, "Just sit back down, I've been told I give pretty good massages."

Riku smiled genuinely and plopped his butt back on the log. "I don't wear socks and they get kinda stinky though! So might wanna brace yourself...Sora can't stand it when he gets a whiff of my feet. I used to tease him all the time with them.."

You tried to hide the growing tent in your pants as you got on the sand and Riku began to slip off his sneaks.
12.title: Riku's Feet

choices: You lie and says it stinks
You tell the truth and say you love the smell
121.content:
Riku sighed softly as his sneakers popped off his feet, wiggling his toes as the cool air hits his sweaty feet.

You immediately notice the strong cheesy smell as soon as those sneakers come off. You have to lean forward to hide the tent in your pants, the smell doing nothing but making it bigger. The next thing you notice is Riku's sweaty feet in your lap.

Riku is smirking down at you once again "Can't let my feet get sand all over them, that would be bad. Hope you don't mind them resting in your lap as you massage them for me." He smirks again as he wiggles his toes on your lap

You nod softly "Uh yea...that's fine I guess." You to hide your excitement as you pick up his right foot, holding it at stomach level so you don't give off the impression that you want to lick that sweaty sole, even though that is what you are dying to do. Trying to ignore the strong scent coming off his feet, you start massaging the large sweaty sole, smiling softly as you here Riku groan softly.

"God, that feels amazing. You hands feel great on my sweaty sole" He sighs and smiles as he lifts the other foot up to your face. He smirks and wiggles his toes an inch away from your nose, making you smell their stink. "How does it smell down there?"
121.title: The Massage

choices: Riku Wants You to Sniff his Feet
Riku Wants you to Lick his Sweat Off
1211.content:
You feign a disgusted face, even though you wish to stuff your nose right between those toes and inhale their odor from the source. "To tell you the truth, it's pretty ripe down here! Hehe, kind of a sour smell to be honest!" You chuckle lightheartedly and playfully fan the air in front of your nose.

"Do they usually reek like this, Riku?" You ask, genuinely curious about his foot odor situation. You don't stop massaging his sole, wanting him to be as comfortable and relaxed as possible. Riku smirks and proudly flexes his toes, "Most of the time, yeah. Especially after I've had my shoes on all day in the hot sun. Sora's have a stink to them too, but his are more of a cheesy smell...but damn they're pungent, PHEW!" Riku jokingly fanned the air and pinched his nose.

The thought of being Sora and Riku's pitiful little foot slave was turning you on immensely...
1211.title: Riku's Stink

choices: Riku rubs his foot on your face
12111.content:
Riku smiled softly down to you as you continued massaging his foot. You moved to the ball of his foot, massaging right under his toes. This action brings a soft moan from Riku's mouth, making you smile.

Riku smiles back down to you, a little bit of a smirk on his face. "This may be an odd request, but I love feeling the air move between my toes when they are sweaty like this. Could you maybe sniff them for me?"

You have to hold yourself back from lunging right for his toes, making a somewhat disgusted face to him "Um, I don't know Riku. I mean, your feet kinda reek."

Riku smiles softly down to you, giving you puppy dog eyes "Please? It will help me relax so much."

Not able to resist Riku, and finally getting a chance to smell his feet up close, you nod "Fine, I just hope the smell doesn't knock me out." You chuckle as Riku smiles and puts his toes on your nose.

As soon as those toes hit your nose, you are assaulted with the powerful stench of his feet. You give out a slight cough from the intensity of the odor. You fake a disgusted look on your face, but the bulge inside your pants throbs a little from the stench. You don't see it, but Riku notice's the throb and smirks. You continue massaging his foot as you smell his fragrant toes. This continues on for a minute until...
12111.title: Riku's Fragrant Toes

choices: Riku demands you kiss his sole now!
Riku wants you to sniff his toe-crotches
121111.content:
Riku's foot slowly slid its way up your face, greasing it along as it made its journey. Riku's grin widened as he stopped when your nose was pressed into his arch and his toes were flexing and wiggling on your forehead. "Yeah, sniff right there! Get a good whiff of that!" Riku playfully acted dominant towards you, which made your bulge twitch even more.

Riku noticed this of course, and his hunch turned out to be proven right: You liked his feet. So he was going to give you all the time you could ask for with them...as his slave...whether you wanted it or not.

You pretended to gag but took a big whiff of Riku's sole anyway, chuckling and playing along by saying: "Yes, master Riku!"
121111.title: Riku rubs his foot on your face

choices: ...meet me at my house tomorrow after school"
1211112.content:
Riku grinned evilly as he hears you call him master. "That's right. I am your master and you belong to me now." He laughs as he keeps rubbing his foot over your face, slowly starting to leave the smell of his feet on your face. "Now sniff between my toes slave!"

Through shock, you take his foot away from your face and stare up at him. You thought about being his foot slave before, but now that it's actually happening it is making you a bit nervous.

"You...you can't be serious! I can't be your slave! I won't be your slave!" You saw as you start to get up. Before you can even move an inch, Riku is standing up with his foot on your face, pushing it down into the sand and making you lay down.

He moves his foot so your nose is right between his big and second toe. His big sweaty sole is covering your mouth, forcing you to breathe through his rank toes. As you look up to Riku, you notice that he has his phone in his hand, pointing down to you.

Suddenly you hear a clicking noise. Riku smirks down to you, showing you that he just took a picture of you under his foot and smelling his toes. "Yes, you will be my slave. That is, you will be if you don't want this photo being shown to everyone at school and your family."
1211112.title: Riku wants you to sniff his toe-crotches

choices: Riku Wants your tongue in between!

"Keep worshiping my feet right now! Sniff between my sweaty toes!" Riku ordered as he sat his butt back on the log and smacked your cheek with his other foot that wasn't currently polluting your nostrils with its stench.

"Go on! I want to feel your sniffs! I wanna feel you vacuum the grease and sweat that's all in between those big toes!" Riku laughed evilly as a couple tears fell from your eyes at your situation, and of course due to the unbearable smell that was hurting your nose.

You took as deep a breath as possible through Riku's toe crotch, making the silver haired adonis moan in pleasure at the feeling of your air between his sensitive toes. The toes wiggled slightly and Riku smirked down at you, "Good boy."
12111122.title: ...keep worshiping my feet right now"

choices: Sora asks Riku to smell his feet or socks
Sora shoves his feet in your face
121111222.content:
It's 4:30 PM the next day, and you are currently standing in front of Riku's door. After the evens of yesterday, you were officially his slave. He told you to meet him at his house after school. Reluctantly, you knock on the door and hope for the best.

As soon as you knock, the door flings open and you see Sora with a wide grin on his face. “Riku, he is here! He actually came!” Sora yelled excitedly as he grabbed you, shut the door, and took you to the living room where Riku was already sitting on a couch. Sora sat down next to him, shoes and socks still on his feet also.

Riku is smirking at you, shoes and socks still on his feet. “You came, good slave. Now, sit there in front of our feet. That shall be your place from now on.” You nod, not saying anything as you sit at their feet and looking up to Riku.

You suddenly hear a loud bang and immediately smell a strong cheesy odor. You look over to see that Sora has taken his shoes off. The room is filled with the smell of his feet, the smell starting to turn you on.

You notice that his socks are soaking wet and basically molded on his large, what appears to be size 15 feet. He sits there, sighing and wiggling his toes happily. “This air feels sooo good on my feet.” He brings a foot up to his face and sniffs it, immediately taking his face away when he gets a sniff “Phew!! Riku, these things reek! I have worn these socks all week and they have never smelt this bad” He giggles as he puts his feet in front of you.

You can’t help but to stare at the feet in awe. You see Sora lean down and start to slowly take that sock off, revealing some of the heel. “Sorry about the smell. But Riku said you like the smell and feet, so I am not sorry!” Sora giggles as he slowly removes his sock, revealing that large sweaty sole.

“Riku! My hands are already wet from the sweat and I have barely touched my feet. I think our slave is gonna like this!” Sora giggles as he slowly takes his sock, revealing his now completely bare foot and toes. Riku grins knowingly down to you. You stare at the huge sweaty foot, seeing pieces of sock lint on the sole and in between the toes. Sora repeats the slow, teasing process for his other foot. Now both of Sora’s huge, sweaty, smelly bare feet are resting in front of you. You have a plain view of the soles from your angle.
121111222.title: Skip to Next Day!

choices: Sora Is Proud of his Foot Stink
1211112221.content:
"Ahhhhh...feels good!" Sora sighs as he flexes those large bulbous toes right in front of you. He grins innocently down at you as he wiggles and wafts his toes toward your nose, "I hope you like my stink as much as Riku told me you liked his! I worked up a sweat at school today and like I said I've not changed my socks in a whole week!" Sora bragged with a big cheeky grin on his face.

Riku tapped Sora on the shoulder from his side of the couch, Sora turned to his friend. "What's up Riku?" He asked. Riku smirked and got a determined look on his face. "I can smell your big stompers from up here, but I think we should give the other person's feet a test whiff when they are fresh out of their shoes and socks. Like, right now your feet have just been released....so I think I should see how smelly and rank they are before our pitiful slave gets the privilege of smelling yours."

Sora blinked then broke out laughing, "Ha ha ha! Man, Riku! That's funny! You said it's a privilege for him to smell my foot stink! Like he has to earn the right to stick his nose in my feet or something! That's hilarious!" Riku smirked, "And why not buddy? We are his masters after all. Now bring that big foot up here for me to get a whiff of!" Riku encouraged.

Sora grinned cockily, "You asked for it! Don't blame me if you can't handle it!" he lifted one of his huge pudgy feet up to Riku's lap, and Riku held it by the ankle in his hands. Sora gave Riku a bright smile and flexed his toes before Riku's face. "Go ahead! Tell me what they're like!" Riku pressed his nose in the center of Sora's soft and squishy sole and inhaled deeply.

"Oooh! Better hope you didn't suck up any sweaty sock lint!" Sora joked.

Riku coughed a bit, "Man! They stink like old moldy cheese! My feet may be bad, but yours are waaaay cheesy!"
1211112221.title: Riku Samples Sora's Stink

choices: Sora makes you smell his feet
12111122211.content:
Sora giggled happily, flexing his toes on Riku’s forehead. “I know! Here, smell the toes!” Sore giggled as he curled his toes over Riku’s nose. Riku coughed louder and had to take the foot away from his face “God Sora, get those toes away from my nose!” He said, waving his hand in front of his nose and taking a piece of sock lint off that was stuck to his nose

Sora laughed innocently and put his huge feet back down in front of you. “Here slave, now you smell my rank huge toes!” He smiles hard as he suddenly puts his toes right on your nose, wiggling them causing some of their sweat and sock lint to get on your nose.

You immediately smell the rank cheesy stench. You fall back a little, the sudden stench causing you to go into a small coughing fit. Sora giggles loudly at you. “Riku, I don’t think he can handle the smell of my toes!” Riku smiles to Sora “That just means that we have to train him to handle the stink”

Sora smirked and chuckled, "That sounds awesome! Did ya hear that slave? Soon you'll love my stinky feet! You just have to get used to it! Here, let me help you!" the spike haired boy giggled lightheartedly as he placed his wide sole on your face with your nose in the very center of his soft squishy sole.

"Smell that! Go on! Breathe in my stinky feet!" Sora laughed loudly up on the couch as he felt your nose inhale on his soft sole and it tickled. "Hehehe! Your sniffs tickle my big feet! Keep going!" Sora said as he curled his toes into your hair, rubbing off a few flecks of sock grime.

You sniff and sniff Sora's pudgy soles, making the boy giggle each time like a little kid.

Riku smirked down at you, "How do my best bud's feet smell, slave?"

Sora smiled down at you and pinched your nose with his greasy toes. "Do they stink like moldy cheese?" Sora guffawed with laughter.

You choke a bit and nod as best you can with your nose kept in place by Sora's big toes.

choices: You laugh as it tickles your bare toes.
You blush and enjoy the feeling.
12113.content: Without uttering a single word, Riku lunges from the log and uses both his bare and sweaty soles to push you to the ground. You fall to the sand in a daze before realizing the situation you appeared to be in. Riku had gotten a hold of your own ankles and had them tightly between his pant legs. Your minds flustered with questions as he slowly but surely, removes both of your shoes, resulting in a pungent smell spreading in the air. "Mmmm, your feet don't smell half as bad as mine huh?" he ask's. You stay silent as you attempt to hide your now pulsating crotch from Riku's view. Your attempts are in vain as he clearly noticed it from the beginning of the massage. You wiggle your socked toes as a cool breeze passes by, making your sensitive size ten tootsies shiver. Ten plump digits now faced riku's ever so smiling face as he silently observed his new treat. It took no more than a single comment "Hope you don't mind if i dig in?" before Riku placed all five of your ticklish toes in his mouth! He slurped and suckled on the sensitive digits, as you wiggled your toes within his mouth. You feel his wet tongue explore in between your toes along with worshiping each individual toe.

info.brief_description: You, or Kingdom Hearts characters, have fun with the feet of characters from the series.
info.description: Just a basic foot fetish story with the guy characters from the Kingdom Hearts game series. The only thing not allowed in this story is death, vore, shrinking/growing, and crushing the character. You can take control of one of the characters from the series, or be in a first person POV. Sexual content is allowed.
